dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED Files.Ref, Files.FileOwner, Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.LockedDate, Files.UniversalModificationDate, Files.CurrentVersion, FilesVersions.Ref AS Version, FilesVersions.Comment, FilesVersions.Extension AS Type, FilesVersions.Size, Files.SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted, FilesVersions.CreationDate, DATEADD(Files.UniversalModificationDate, SECOND, &SecondsToLocalTime) AS ChangeDate, Files.Author, 1 AS Count, 2 AS UnorderableField FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN Catalog.FilesVersions AS FilesVersions ON Files.Ref = FilesVersions.Owner {WHERE (DATEADD(Files.UniversalModificationDate, SECOND, &SecondsToLocalTime) BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod), (FilesVersions.Size >= &Size), (FilesVersions.Author IN (&AuthorsOfVersions)), (CASE WHEN &ShowAllVersions = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE Files.CurrentVersion = FilesVersions.Ref END)}

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED Files.Ref, Files.FileOwner, Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.LockedDate, Files.UniversalModificationDate, Files.CurrentVersion, FilesVersions.Ref AS Version, FilesVersions.Comment, FilesVersions.Extension AS Type, FilesVersions.Size, Files.SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted, FilesVersions.CreationDate, Files.Author, 1 AS Count FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN Catalog.FilesVersions AS FilesVersions ON Files.Ref = FilesVersions.Owner {WHERE (FilesVersions.CreationDate BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod), (FilesVersions.Size >= &Size), (FilesVersions.Author IN (&AuthorsOfVersions)), (CASE WHEN &ShowAllVersions = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE Files.CurrentVersion = FilesVersions.Ref END)}

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED Files.Ref, Files.FileOwner, Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.LockedDate, Files.CurrentVersion.CreationDate AS CreationDate, Files.CurrentVersion, FilesVersions.Ref AS Version, FilesVersions.Comment, FilesVersions.Extension AS Type, FilesVersions.Size, Files.SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted, FilesVersions.CreationDate, Files.Author, 1 AS Count FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN Catalog.FilesVersions AS FilesVersions ON Files.Ref = FilesVersions.Owner {WHERE (FilesVersions.CreationDate BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod), (FilesVersions.Size >= &Size), (FilesVersions.Author IN (&AuthorsOfVersions)), (CASE WHEN &ShowAllVersions = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE Files.CurrentVersion = FilesVersions.Ref END)}

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED Files.Ref, Files.FileOwner, Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.LockedDate, Files.CurrentVersion, FilesVersions.Ref AS Version, FilesVersions.Comment, FilesVersions.Extension AS Type, FilesVersions.Size, Files.SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted, FilesVersions.CreationDate, Files.Author, 1 AS Count FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN Catalog.FilesVersions AS FilesVersions ON Files.Ref = FilesVersions.Owner {WHERE (FilesVersions.CreationDate BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod), (FilesVersions.Size >= &Size), (FilesVersions.Author IN (&AuthorsOfVersions)), (CASE WHEN &ShowAllVersions = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE Files.CurrentVersion = FilesVersions.Ref END)}

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT Files.Ref, Files.FileOwner, Files.BeingEditedBy, Files.LockedDate, Files.CurrentVersion, FilesVersions.Ref AS Version, FilesVersions.Comment, FilesVersions.Extension AS Type, FilesVersions.Size, Files.SignedWithDS, Files.Encrypted, FilesVersions.CreationDate, FilesVersions.Author, 1 AS Count FROM Catalog.Files AS Files LEFT JOIN Catalog.FilesVersions AS FilesVersions ON Files.Ref = FilesVersions.Owner {WHERE (FilesVersions.CreationDate BETWEEN &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod), (FilesVersions.Size >= &Size), (CASE WHEN &ShowAllVersions = TRUE THEN TRUE ELSE Files.CurrentVersion = FilesVersions.Ref END)}
